original: intros m x x' H1 H2. unfold Br1. destruct (succ_dec m zero x) as [H3 | H3], (succ_dec m zero x') as [H4 | H4]. - rewrite (B0_L0_L0 m x (top m zero x) x' (bottom m zero x')). reflexivity. + apply H1. + apply H2. + apply H3. + apply H4. - rewrite (B_1_not_exd m zero x'). + reflexivity. + apply H1. + intros H. apply H4. symmetry. apply H. + unfold not. intros H. apply H3. apply H. - rewrite (B_1_not_exd m zero x). + reflexivity. + apply H1. + apply H3. + intros H. apply H4. apply H. - rewrite (B_not_exd m zero x'). + reflexivity. + apply H1. + intros H. apply H3. symmetry. apply H.
